website_summaries.verdict: The Perfect Blend Pro would be a good addition to the kitchen of a novice cook who needs help and calorie counts for smoothies and more. Everyone else should save a few bucks and stick with a regular kitchen scale.
pros: The Bluetooth-connected Perfect Blend Pro scale talks to your device to tell you how to build a smoothie, drink or other blended item based on the weight of the ingredients
The $100 scale also works with the Perfect Drink and Perfect Bake apps so you can use weight to build cocktails and baked goods, respectively
cons: The family of Perfect apps aren't integrated, so you have to jump across apps to use the scale with different recipes
The instructions will get tedious if you prefer to throw together a blended beverage
You have to provide your own blender on top of spending 100 bucks for the scale

customer_reviews.title: I love these products
customer_reviews.text: I love these products. I just used the Perfect Bake over Thanksgiving to make pumpkin cheesecake, which was delicious. This app is much more innovative than its precursors, with helpful hints that guide you through the process of connecting the bluetooth scale exceptionally well. You can also choose between conventional, personal, or combo blenders, which is a nice touch for those of us who live by the bullet. The best part of the Perfect Blend this time of year is their soups - I've already tried the minestrone (my favorite kind) which was great, and the celery potato, which is hearty but not heavy. All very good (and simple). Well done!
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: This is really cool for people that want to control portions/calories!
customer_reviews.text: Love my Perfect Blend scale. Works perfectly with my Vitamix blender... this is great for tracking calories in your smoothies and other sauces and soups. If you aren't into baking then just get the scale and all the apps (Blend, Bake and Drink) are free off the app store(s)!
customer_reviews.author: MBinDallas

customer_reviews.title: Must have for gadget lovers
customer_reviews.text: New upgrade Use it with new v1200 Vitamix Super nice
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: A perfect compliment to Vitamix Ascent blender.
customer_reviews.text: The scale can be used as a stand-alone weight measuring tool, but it really shines in combination with Vitamix Ascent blenders and the Vitamix recipes app (I use it on iPad). The scale is also easy to switch between OZ and Gr. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: VY

customer_reviews.title: You will stress eat if you purchase this product. It is the worst scale of all time.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had bad products. I’ve overlooked the problems with bad products. That said, this is a bad product and I cannot overlook it. I truly wasted my money on this junk. It recalibrates while weighing food (imagine putting dressing on a salad and it erases the data mid-weigh). It randomly switches between measurements and the timer. The timer starts on it’s own. The functions routinely get stuck. And so on and so forth. I have had two of these products. Both were horrible. Do not make a mistake and purchase this item. You are better off purchasing a haunted doll.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: More than just a scale
customer_reviews.text: This is the second scale like this that I've bought. The first one was a vitamix branded one from Costco and when looking for a mothers day gift for my mom we bought this one. Works exactly like the vitamix one and she uses the exact same apps. These really are a lot of fun when using the perfectbake, perfectblend, and perfectdrink apps. Plus it's just a regular kitchen scale as well that you can use without an app.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Swant

customer_reviews.title: Works great I use mine with a Blendtec 625 Blender
customer_reviews.text: Works great I use mine with a Blendtec 625 Blender

customer_reviews.title: Use a scale to become a master chef.
customer_reviews.text: Cooking by weight instead of volume is the most accurate way to cook. This scale makes that a reality. A scale and a Thermometer are vital for precise recipes.

customer_reviews.title: Love it

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product, even better customer service from KazConnections
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this from KazConnections. The product is fantastic and super helpful in controlling portion sizes. I would also like to point out that the customer service from Cookie was the best I have ever experienced from an Amazon seller. Immediately responsive and helpful when I requested a different model of scales. Thank you Cookie.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the Vitamix A3500 Ascent Blender
customer_reviews.text: The scale has a very easy to read display and also works with your smartphone. We use this to make smoothies without the need to measure anything as the scale has an app that "measures" ingredients with pre defined recipes. Just toss in the ingredients and when the right amount is in the container the app beeps telling you it has enough. The scale even knows which Vitamix container is on it as it reads the new Vitamix containers that have a chip inside. Then the scale sends the right blender setting to the Vitamix Ascent to complete the recipe.
customer_reviews.author: Mark - AppMyHome

customer_reviews.title: best invention ever, thank you!!
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow! Best invention ever!!!! We just got it and have made 4 things! It was a mom/11 yr. old daughter bonding experience as we went shopping for real foods and had fun in the kitchen together. Was so easy to use and the clean up next to nothing!!!! We actually bought 2 scales (one to keep at our house and one at grandparents when daughter spends the weekends!) Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: This is not worth the extra functions.
customer_reviews.text: This is an extremely annoying scale for day to day use. I got it for my Vitamix blender --and its great for that. But for non-Vitamix use, I finally gave up and bought a cheap digital scale for daily use. This doesn't go to Tare function easily. It seems to whimsically switch from ounces to grams. It makes annoying noises.

customer_reviews.text: The Pro Blend Scale is perfect for anyone whose goal it is to enjoy fun, healthy and (most of all) EASY recipes. I'm always excited to try something new.

customer_reviews.title: Does not include blender container
customer_reviews.text: Product did not meet my expectations. It is a good product, but, was not what I needed.

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't connect wirelessly
customer_reviews.text: I tried to get it connect to my internet through my computer, my various iPads, and my iPhone, but with no luck. None of my devices could find its signal. So disappointed. This product sounded like a great idea. I sent it back to Amazon the next day. I'm waiting for my refund.
customer_reviews.author: jccwc

customer_reviews.title: Purchased from local Costco and love this device
customer_reviews.text: Purchased from local Costco and love this device. I did see a 1 🌟 review on here and wanted to comment, this scale doesn't connect to the internet via WiFi, it connects to the app on your mobile/tablet device via Bluetooth. And this connection process was flawless. Just make sure Bluetooth is turned on with your device, launch the app, then turn on the scale and will pair itself with the app.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisM

customer_reviews.title: Not So Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scale during a Vitamix demo at on site location. I was told I could add my own recipes. This is true to a certain extent. I buy fruits and veggies then freeze them to use later for my smoothies. The data base had some frozen items, but it did not have many....e.g. no frozen grapes or frozen spinach. If it isn't in the data base, forget about trying to add it to a recipe. The scale then was just an expensive food scale for me, so I returned it for refund. It did have many recipes for smoothies and other items; I just wanted it to work for mine.
customer_reviews.author: tracer

customer_reviews.title: Best scale ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scale in addition to my brand new Vitamix (newest model), it is the best scale ever had and fun to use. You can use it as a regular scale or with the app.... there is the Perfect Bake App too and it is wonderful, no more measuring cups or spoons which means no big messes. I paid a little more for mine so this is a good deal. The scale is very accurate and is very sensitive to measuring down to .000 instead of .00. This scale is a no brainer! I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Alier

product_meta.title: Perfect Blend PRO Smart Scale + App—Track nutrition and make delicious smoothies
product_meta.description:
Get more from your blender. Make delicious blended recipes AND track nutrition at the same time. Just choose a recipe, place a blender jar on the scale, add ingredients as the app guides you, and blend. See the nutrition info update in real time!



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 




Why choose PRO? Our top-of-the-line model, Perfect Blend PRO, features a wireless (Bluetooth 4.0) scale in beautiful stainless steel finish with backlit LCD display—a sleek addition to any kitchen counter. Measuring up to 13 lbs with 0.1 g precision, it’s the most accurate consumer kitchen scale in the market.

Achieve your nutrition goals Tracking your nutrition has never been easier. Perfect Blend displays the calorie count for each ingredient you add to the blender jar. It also calculates nutrition for an entire recipe or just a portion. Send the data to your favorite fitness apps through Apple Health or Google Fit.




Choose a recipe Choose from hundreds of recipes (smoothies, soups, dips, sauces and more) or add your own.

Just add ingredients No measuring! Follow real-time instructions to add ingredients directly into the blender jar.

Achieve goals & enjoy! Enjoy delicious blended recipes that meet your nutrition goals. Track nutrition for each ingredient, the whole recipe, or a portion you serve. 




Go beyond smoothies. Get creative. Explore your culinary interests through new recipes and techniques—from simple smoothies and juices to advanced sauces and dressings. You’ll be amazed by how easy it is–and fun!




About the Startup Describe your product in 3 words.

Blend, Track, Achieve

How did you come up with the idea for this product?

We taste-tested many cocktails developing Perfect Drink. Then we taste-tested lots of baked goods developing Perfect Bake. It was time to detox. Enter Perfect Blend with nutrition tracking features.

What makes your product special?

The nutrition tracking aspects of this product is ground breaking. It’s awesome to see the calorie count update as you add an ingredient. You can even scale a recipe by the desired number of calories.

What has been the best part of your startup experience?

Seeing our products on the shelves and hearing from our users how much they love the product never gets old.
feature_bullets: Trying to keep your diet in check? Perfect Blend tracks nutrition by calculating calories, fat, carbs, protein and more for each recipe. Data is easily imported into Apple Health or Google Fit.
Includes: wireless scale, app, phone/tablet stand, and a 20 oz. to-go cup. Compatible with: Bluetooth 4.0, iOS 10.0 or higher, Android 5.0 or higher. Works with ALL blenders.
The Perfect Blend App is now the Vitamix Perfect Blend App! Still works with any blender, but bonus features if you use it with Vitamix Venturist or Ascent series blenders!
Perfect Blend PRO helps you blend up delicious recipes faster and with less mess! Works with any blender you have at home. Just place it on the scale and pour!
Watch the virtual blender jar fill up in real time on the app screen and listen for the “ding” to know when you’ve added enough. No more measuring cups means less mess!
